title: The Oberoi Concours d’ Elegance to be held from Feb 16-18 at The Oberoi Udaivilas
description: The Oberoi Group said the Oberoi Concours d’Elegance will set a 'new benchmark' to showcase the 'finest' vintage and classic automobiles and motorcycles from India and abroad. The event will be curated by automotive historian Manvendra Singh Barwani.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
